description: This file defines a React component named NotificationsPanel that displays recent notifications or updates fetched from a shared context. It also includes a helper function formatTime for formatting timestamp values.

methods.name: NotificationsPanel()
methods.description: React functional component that renders a notifications panel displaying recent updates. It accesses notifications via React context and displays them in a styled container.

methods.name: formatTime(t)
methods.description: Helper function that converts a timestamp into a localized string format, or returns the input if formatting fails.
